observation: Navigating to https://kromaton.com/en/ returned status code 200

thought: The website is accessible and returned a successful status code. I will now extract the text from the page to look for any signs of scam characteristics.
observation: » Home (en)  Products FCPC-A Peripheral Equipment Services Before Sales After Sales Optimization CPC Applications Technologies About Us History Our Group Partnerships News Research Industries Contact menu The Experts In Centrifugal Partition Chromatography Kromaton Get to know the FCPC® Research Fields Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients Flavor & Fragrance Microbial Biotechnology Natural Products Cannabinoids A Cost-Effective Solution The Kromaton FCPC® is a purely liquid phase chromatograph. There are no required solid packing resins to replace or regenerate. Sample recovery rates of 100% are typical due to the non-adsorbing, liquid-liquid configuration of the system. High purities and throughputs With Fast Centrifugal Partition Chromatography®, solvent systems are tuned to target individual molecular types or groups of molecular species. Molecular species are separated based on small differences their affinities to each phase in the solvent system. No sample loss and 100% recovery The liquid-liquid rotor of the FCPC® allows for complete sample recovery through an extrusion step at the end of each run. Target molecules are eluted in order of their affinity to the mobile phase solvent, and the remainder of the sample can be collected from the extrusion step and reprocessed in a separate run. Low solvent consumption FCPC® uses significantly less solvent that other types of solid-bed (resin) chromatography. With solvent consumption rates as low as 50 ml per gram of sample processed, FCPC® can provide significant savings in solvent recovery and waste. Scalable Results The Kromaton FCPC® is available in a range of sizes from analytical laboratory scale through pilot plant production scale. FCPC® C Analytical-scale CPC Flexible for easy scale up Industrial scale CPC We’re industry leaders Rousselet Robatel has been helping customers develop processes and achieve production requirements for over 250 combined years. We are experts in separation from laboratory to industrial scale. Client Satisfaction We have been using the machine for 2 years and it has been rock solid. Any problems are addressed immediately by their service team with either overnight parts or service techs onsite and we have had almost no operational gaps. We love our CPC system! Dan G. Recovery Clinic We’re part of the Rousselet Centrifugation Group Benefiting from the Rousselet Robatel Group know-how, our 316L stainless steel Fast Centrifugal Partition Chromatography systems FCPC® are designed and manufactured for research and development laboratories, pilot plants, and industrial production facilities. FCPC® is integrated in the chemical & pharmaceutical industries, as well as in the cosmetics, biotechnologies, and natural products fields. Rousselet Robatel (Europe) Robatel (North America) Email: info@kromaton.com Worldwide: +33(0)4 75 69 22 114 www.rousselet-robatel.com (413) 499-4818 www.rr-centrifuge.com © 2024 Kromaton. All rights reserved. Site Credit

thought: The extracted text does not indicate unusually low prices, claims of free money, or targeting human psychological weaknesses. It seems to describe a legitimate business specializing in chromatography with a focus on client satisfaction and industry leadership. The mention of "over 250 combined years" suggests a long-standing operation. However, I should verify the company's existence and the appropriateness of contact information provided on the site to rule out scam characteristics 4 and 6.
